Application.Repository

Interface AnswerRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Answer,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Answer,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Answer,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Answer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Answer,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface AnswerRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Answer,java.lang.Integer>
    An interface to manage the data access to the Answer table.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

      java.util.Collection<Answer> findAllQuizAnswers(int id_quiz)

    • Method Detail

      • findAllQuizAnswers

        @Query(value="SELECT * FROM answer as a JOIN question as q ON a.id_question = q.id_question WHERE q.id_quiz = :id_quiz",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.Collection<Answer> findAllQuizAnswers(@Param(value="id_quiz")
                                                                                                                                                                                                  int id_quiz)
        Returns the list of Answer(s) to the Question(s) of a Quiz with the provided unique identifier.
        Parameters:
        id_quiz - The unique identifier of the Quiz.
        Returns:
        The list of Answer(s) to the Question(s) of a Quiz with the provided unique identifier.
